mapper.insert: insert into usr_bdg(uno, bno, ord) values(#{user.no}, #{badge.no}, #{order})

select.if: select datediff(now(), cdt) from user where uno=#{userNo}
select count(*) from user u inner join user follow f inner join user u2 on f.fwer_no=u2.uno where u.uno = f.fwing_no and u2.state=1

select count(*) from article a left outer join arc_tag at on a.arno = at.arno left outer join tag t on at.tno = t.tno left outer join user u on a.writer = u.uno where t.tno = #{tagNo} and u.uno = #{userNo}

select count(*) from comment c left outer join arc_tag at on c.arno = at.arno left outer join tag t on at.tno = t.tno left outer join user u on c.uno = u.uno where t.tno = #{tagNo} and u.uno = #{userNo}
